title: Full-Res. Simple. Supreme Photo Albums
subtitle: The prime solution for sharing photos: Create albums, add friends, upload full-resolution images and write comments - make everlasting memories!

features.title: Full resolution
features.description: Share your photos in full resolution in their original quality.

features.title: Premium privacy
features.description: No ads, no tracking and secure storage: the advantages of an independent company benefit everyone.

features.title: Free for the first year
features.description: No subscriptions, no storage limits: Premium features are paid once and kept forever. During the first year of usage, all albums are Premium for free!

features.title: AirDrop, but for groups
features.description: Apart from Android support, Echo Photos has many advantages compared to AirDrop. With smart download tools, never accidentally download your photos again!

features.title: Refined design
features.description: A carefully crafted app: Simple and yet feature-rich, letting you focus on what you want to do.

features.title: Social sharing
features.description: Comments and likes for your group images: Echo provides a private social network experience. For real friends only.

sections.title: Share Photos - Keep Forever
paragraphs: With Echo Photos, you'll get fast, simple and eternal photo sharing. No subscription needed!
Echo Photos is the best way to share pictures of a memorable day with your friends.
Safely store your pictures with Echo Photos' eternal storage.
Like and comment your friends' pictures in your albums.

desktop.title: Desktop
desktop.description: Use Echo Photos wherever you want! Besides the main iOS and Android apps you can also view your albums on macOS and in the browser!

sections.title: Echo Photos In Your Browser
sections.description: Upload and download the photos directly from your computer through the Echo Photos browser plugin.

sections.title: Client For MacOS
sections.description: Use Echo Photos through the macOS App on any Mac that uses the same iCloud account as your iOS device. Currently, log-in is only possible this way.
